Title: Danse Macabre
Plot: Nick and Hank's investigation of a dead high school teacher leads them to the school's outcast, Roddy. Nick realizes that there's more to Roddy than meets the eye, and enlists Monroe's help to get through to the troubled teenager before he exacts revenge on the students who wronged him. Meanwhile, Nick learns that his presence is beginning to affect the creature world.
GuestStars: Nick Thurston, Sharon Sachs, Judith Hoag, Amelia Rose Blaire, Danny Belrose, Will Cuddy, Aaron Landon, Chase Oferle, Danny Bruno
